subject: XML TestRunner
msgSnippet: I am looking for a TestRunner for generating XML output. I wonder whether any one has done any work on this. I would appreciate if you could point me to the
messageBody:
I am looking for a TestRunner for generating XML output. I wonder whether
any one has done any work on this. I would appreciate if you could point me
to the right direction before I start reinventing the wheel.

Regards,
Stephen
